AbleToDarkMode - Enhanced Dark Mode for a Better Browsing Experience

Welcome to AbleToDarkMode! This powerful extension transforms your web browsing into a seamless, eye-friendly experience by applying a customizable dark theme to every website you visit. Based on the widely acclaimed Dark Reader, our rebranded extension retains all its functionalities while offering a unique and enhanced user interface.

Features:
•	Customizable Dark Themes: Choose from a range of dark themes to suit your preference and reduce eye strain, especially in low-light environments.
•	Site-Specific Settings: Tailor the dark mode settings for individual websites, ensuring optimal readability and appearance on every site.
•	Brightness and Contrast Adjustment: Fine-tune brightness, contrast, sepia, and grayscale levels to achieve the perfect look and feel.
•	Font Settings: Customize font styles and sizes to enhance your reading comfort.
•	Automatic Scheduling: Set dark mode to turn on automatically at specific times, such as sunset to sunrise, for a hassle-free experience.
•	Inversion Fixes: Automatically detect and fix color inversion issues on websites for a consistent dark mode experience.
•	No Ads, No Tracking: Enjoy a clean browsing experience without ads or tracking.

Why Choose AbleToDarkMode?
•	Based on Dark Reader: Our extension is built upon the trusted and widely-used Dark Reader, ensuring reliability and a comprehensive feature set.
•	Enhanced Interface: Experience a refined user interface designed for ease of use and seamless integration into your browser.
•	Completely Free: AbleToDarkMode is free to use, with no hidden fees or premium features.

How to Use:
1.	Install AbleToDarkMode from the Chrome Web Store.
2.	Click the AbleToDarkMode icon in your browser toolbar to activate the dark mode.
3.	Customize your settings through the extension's intuitive options panel.

Upgrade your browsing experience with AbleToDarkMode today and enjoy the benefits of a beautifully darkened web!
Permissions: AbleToDarkMode requires permission to read and change your data on the websites you visit to apply the dark theme. Rest assured, we respect your privacy and do not collect or share any personal information.

Support: For any issues or feedback, please contact us at support@abletodarkmode.com.
